basics.text:
**Basics**

** Selecting Slots**
Click on the slot you want to edit inside the inventory GUI. The slot will be highlighted (color we choose) if it has been selected.

**Setting the itemstacks type*
To set an itemstack's type, click the Item selector inside the Stack Details and scroll down the list till you find the itemstack you are looking for. Keep in mind the names of each items match the names that are in game, nwhich are not the same as the Material types Bukkit or spigot provides

**Setting the name of an itemstack** Also inside the Stack Details tab, the Name editor controls the name of the itemstack. The editor supports ChatColors and color codes.

**Setting the lore of an itemstack**
To set the lore of an itemstack, you have to select the Lore editor in the Lore tab. In here, each new line in the editor represents a new line in the lore. The lore editor supports chatcolors.

**Adding Enchantments**
To add enchantments, you have to select the Enchantments tab. From there, select the enchantment you want to add and the power level. Once you set those values, click the "Add Enchantment" button to add the enchantment. To remove an enchantment, click the "remove enchantment" button while having the enchatnment selector set to whichever enchantment you want to remove.

 Note that you can only add one of each type of enchantment to an itemstack. Adding a new enchentment that has the same enchantment type as another existing enchantment will override the previous enchantmet.

==Editing the Inventory==

**Chaning the name of the inventory**
You can edit the name of the inventory by editing the Name Editor inside the Inventory Tab. The editor supports chatcolors.

**Chaning the amount of rows for the inventory**
To change the amount of rows, select the Row count inside the Inventory tab. 

Note that when removing rows to the invenory, itemstacks in the delted row will be deleted.
